name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Java Engineer with 10+ years of experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, proficient in **Java**, **JUnit**, **TestNG**, **Mockito**, and **Spring** framework. Demonstrated expertise in developing microservices with **JPA** and **Hibernate**, and adept in leveraging tools like **Maven** and **Gradle** for project management. Experienced in setting up CI/CD pipelines using **Jenkins**, **GitHub**, and **GitLab** to streamline software delivery. Competent in utilizing message brokers such as **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for event-driven architectures. 
Additionally, skilled in cloud-native application development on **AWS** and **Azure**, while managing container orchestration with **Kubernetes**. Background in full-stack development with hands-on knowledge in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, and frameworks such as **React**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI** brings versatility to the role. Strong focus on building secure, maintainable solutions, ensuring compliance with standards including HIPAA and PCI DSS. Passionate about driving real-world impact through innovative software solutions.
